name: Knife Toss: Hit the Fruit
description:
The ultimate knife challenge is here!
Tap the screen to launch a flying knife, hit the watermelon, pineapple, lemon, apple... with certain amount of super knives. This is a game that perfectly relieves stress.
Be careful to not hit the knives or the spikes. Time your actions, target carefully and become the best flying knife master on the leaderboard.

Game Features:
- Dozens of knives with cool design and more to come
- Simple control
- Easy and fun to play, even more fun to master with skills
- Unique game mechanics

An addictive game that will definitely absorb you in its spin universe!
